name.description: The name of the minimum energy path object.

methodType.description: Whether NEB, string method, or series of constrained geometry optimisations is used.

numberGeometries.description: Number of geometries that eventually form the minimum energy path (Could be more than the input geometries).

energyBarrier.description: Difference in energy between the initial geometry and the transition state geometry.

energies.description: Energy of each replica of the system identifying the minimum energy path.

geometryConstraints.description: Geometrical constraints defined in the simulation.

geometryConstraintsIncrements.description: Increments used to vary some of the constraints in case the constrained geometry optimisation method is used to determine the minimum energy path.

comments.description: Comments to the density functional theory.
